name: Bit Finder
description:
Made for BITJAM, check out the rules there

In this game, you control a character with the Arrow Keys that moves around the screen. The character never leaves the screen.

Your task is to find the goal by standing on it. The closer you are to the goal, the faster the screen flashes.

When you find the goal, the screen will become solid for a moment, then the next level begins.

Each level is harder than the last; The goal size and the distance from the goal the flashing speeds up gets smaller.

If you download the game you can press Enter to go to fullscreen mode, if you're into that.

Thanks for playing!
